action.text: Amendment SA 30 under the order of 3/23/2023, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 31 - 65. Record Vote Number: 72.
Amendment SA 30 proposed by Senator Ricketts. (consideration: CR S981-982) To require a certification.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 30 proposed by Senator Ricketts.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 30 under the order of 3/23/2023, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 31 - 65. Record Vote Number: 72.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 30 under the order of 3/23/2023, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 31 - 65. Record Vote Number: 72.
